original_text:
As a pregnant woman about to give birth
    writhes and cries out in her pain,
    so were we in your presence, Lord.
korean_text: 여호와여 잉태한 여인이 산기가 임박하여 산고를 겪으며 부르짖음 같이 우리가 주 앞에서 그와 같으니이다

sentences.original_text: As a pregnant woman about to give birth
writhes and cries out in her pain
so were we in your presence, Lord
